snippet: Todd Edwards and DJ EZ played sets as part of MoMA PS1’s outdoor summer music series.
abstract: Jon Caramanica reviews performances by garage music performers Todd Edwards and DJ EZ as part of MoMA PS1's Warm Up series.
lead_paragraph: Todd Edwards and DJ EZ played sets as part of MoMA PS1’s outdoor summer music series.

headline.seo: Todd Edwards and DJ EZ Play MoMA PS1’s Warm Up Series
headline.main: A Garage Revival, With Two Seasoned D.J.s at the Wheel
headline.print_headline: A Garage Revival, With Two Seasoned D.J.s at the Wheel
